ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: We learned different respects of how to do well in scientific research. It is great. I would recommend this course to other students.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It gave general helpful information for being a graduate student, specifically at Yale. Some of the information was helpful to me immediately, but other information may prove more useful later in my career, including the information about the article preparation and review process. This course somewhat contributed to my advancement short-term (though research time for my lab rotations was reduced), but I believe it will also aid me long-term.
Really important course for a career in science.
In particular, I thought the lecture on grant writing and the lecture on giving good scientific talks were useful and timely.
